title: How movies teach manhood
description: When Colin Stokes' 3-year-old son caught a glimpse of "Star Wars," he was instantly obsessed. But what messages did he absorb from the sci-fi classic? Stokes asks for more movies that send positive messages to boys: that cooperation is heroic, and respecting women is as manly as defeating the villain.
author: Colin Stokes
keywords: TED, talks, TEDx, culture, film, identity, men, parenting, movies
